metadata.name: BALLA
metadata.description:
This 1 of 1 unique NFT represents BALLA! 
an immersive installation by Fabio Weik in San Bartolomeo Church; the winner of Premio Stromboli in 2022.

The NFT is a one minute video directed by Fabio Weik in 2019, starring Balla Coulibaly, DOP Francesco Brembati, and Music by Bosdoms.

The owner of the NFT will be the only person able to have access to and download the high resolution full 7 minute video.
